name: Talkochet
description:
A super realistic simulation of a typical office conversation with the boss.

Created in 72 hours for Mini Jam, solo dev, shoutout to the author of the 'BadComic-Regular' font.

Controls:

  • 'R' to reset
  • Esc to exit
  • Left-click to aim and shoot your little avatar

Note: The bubbles are random right now and can be a little lopsided good/bad/neutral. It's something I'll change in the future, but for now if you get a mix you don't like you can just press 'R' to reset :)

___________

Update 7-12: WebGL build is up! Plus some bug/graphical fixes.
